articles.description: The unannounced game was previously mentioned in Activision job adverts…
articles.content:
Activision is reportedly planning to release Call of Duty: WarzoneMobile in 2022.
Thats according to industry insider Tom Henderson, who has a strong track record when it comes to Call of Duty and B… [+2489 chars]
